# National Board of Review Awards 1936

8th National Board of Review Awards
December 18, 1936
{| border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" align="center"
|-
| style="border: 1px" |
|}
The 8th National Board of Review Awards were announced on 18 December 1936.
Best American Films
#Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
#The Story of Louis Pasteur
#Modern Times
#Fury
#Winterset
#The Devil Is a Sissy
#Ceiling Zero
#Romeo and Juliet
#The Prisoner of Shark Island
#The Green Pastures
Top Foreign Films
#Carnival in Flanders
#The New Earth
#Rembrandt
#The Ghost Goes West
#Nine Days a Queen
#We Are from Kronstadt
#Son of Mongolia
#The Yellow Cruise
#Les Misérables
#Secret Agent
Winners
*Best American Film: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
*Best Foreign Film: La kermesse héroïque (Carnival in Flanders), France
References
External links
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20060516091258/http://www.nbrmp.org/awards/past.cfm?year=1936 National Board of Review of Motion Pictures :: Awards for 1936]
